QuestData.Title: Jandvik's Last Hope
QuestData.Description: Commander Malt'his was conferring with a sea giant?$B$BWithout your help, this village will surely fall to the combined forces of the Sashj'tar and the sea giants.$B$B<Toryl stands there quietly for a moment.>$B$BMeet me in an underground cave out in Azuregale Bay.$B$BI want to show you something that may turn the tide in this battle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet with Toryl in the Sashj'tar Grotto.
QuestData.RewardText: I do not know who you are, but I must thank you.
